Description: Rim sherd of pottery deep bowl with lug handle; made in an East Greek style from Nile silt clay; cream/pink slip; exterior reserved; three bars on top of handle and one preserved on top of rim; inside, band near rim; elaborate maeander and part of floral to the centre.
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer & Villing 2006 / East Greek Pottery from Naukratis: The Current State of Research (p.55 Table 1, p. 63 fig. 32)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IA.35)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 179-80, Nau 151, pl. 33f-h)
